title: Interpretation of a dream about having teeth repaired by a doctor

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing teeth repaired at the doctor in a dream for a single girl. When a single girl dreams of having her teeth fixed at the dentist in a dream. It is a good sign that she will become emotionally attached to someone and that will be beneficial for her. Seeing teeth repaired at the dentist for a single girl in a dream. It indicates that there is A handsome young man who tries to support and help her all the time. And the unmarried girl who sees herself in the dentist’s office repairing her damaged teeth in a dream. This dream symbolizes something new that will happen in her life. Perhaps this thing is a wealthy man who will propose to her and live with him in happiness, joy and stability. And when she sees For an unmarried girl, the dentist repairs her teeth. She finds a damaged tooth and removes it in a dream. Good news is that her imminent marriage to a man of knowledge and wisdom will help her solve her problems and give her victory. Seeing an unmarried woman’s teeth being repaired in a dream symbolizes the presence of someone who loves her and helps her in all areas of her life. And he makes the right decisions and wishes her all the best and success. See also: Interpretation of a tooth falling out in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing teeth repaired by a doctor in a dream for a married woman. A married woman when she sees a dentist and has her teeth fixed in a dream. It is a sign of the stability of her married life, and she enjoys peace. Seeing a doctor A woman's teeth are violently repaired in a dream. This is an indication of the existence of a problem between her and her husband. As for her seeing the doctor extracting her rotten teeth in a dream, it symbolizes her husband's cruelty towards her and the presence of constant disputes. A woman sees her husband with her at the dentist while she was having her teeth beautified in A dream. This indicates understanding and love between them. Interpretation of seeing a dentist repairing teeth in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing a dentist repairing teeth in a dream for a man in a dream is evidence that he enjoys peace and wisdom. The vision also means that the dreamer depends in his life on the wise to help him make the right decisions. Seeing a man enduring severe pain while having his teeth repaired at the doctor in a dream. It is a sign of his ability to get out of crises and solve them once and for all. It also indicates the full responsibility that the viewer bears in his family and professional life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream in which a woman’s upper tooth falls out Married Meaning and interpretation of seeing teeth repaired by a doctor in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing teeth repaired by a dentist in a pregnant woman’s dream has many indicators related to childbirth. When a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a dentist repairing her teeth in a dream, this is a sign that her husband will stand by her and support her. It is an expression A metaphor for loving her husband and helping him overcome the pain and fatigue of pregnancy. If the pregnant woman sees that the doctor is repairing her teeth with care and precision. It indicates her husband’s intense love, and consideration of the pregnancy period and its limits. The vision shows her husband’s appreciation for her and his interest in following up with the doctor. The vision also indicates Ease and ease of childbirth. As for the pregnant woman, when she feels severe pain as a result, the doctor repairs her teeth with a toothpick

title: Secrets of interpreting mangoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi regarding good and evil

preview.html: If you are looking for the interpretation of the mango you see in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, you will find it in this article on the encyclopedia website. Everyone seeks to know the meanings behind their dreams and becomes anxious, tense, and afraid of mysterious and disturbing dreams, but everyone must surrender their affairs to God and trust Him completely and not make fatal decisions in their lives except after deep and logical thinking. , where you will find a link to an application for interpreting Dreams, which you can use to interpret more dreams while fully preserving your privacy and information. Interpretation of mangoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin Our respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing mangoes in a dream is a sign of goodness and livelihood that the dreamer will get in reality. Also It is considered a sign of hearing happy news in the near future, God willing, whether the fortuneteller finds him eating it or cutting it in a dream. The matter is no different with mango juice, as it is also strong evidence of the coming of happy events, God willing. Mango is one of the fruits that everyone loves and therefore scholars believe that seeing it In a dream, it portends great goodness, God willing, and almost comfort. Mango instead of God means goodness, happiness, and contentment. Mangoes can sometimes mean positive change in practical, educational, and social terms. Mango is a fruit that shows the dreamer’s good relationship with others, and the person’s ability to enjoy and adapt to others. If There was an academic crisis that the dreamer was going through. Seeing a mango in a dream means success, excellence, and obtaining high grades. If the mango is green, this means that the person faces situations with wisdom, logic, intelligence, and a strong, close relationship with those around him. If the dreamer sees himself picking mangoes from trees This may mean that he will reap the fruits of his work next season, God willing. If the fruit spoils in a dream, this may indicate a major financial loss and negative change in material terms, and therefore the person must seize opportunities intelligently and study all his future steps with intelligence, logic, and insight. Interpretation of a vision Mangoes in a dream for NabulsiIf the dreamer is sick or suffering from a difficult health problem, then seeing mangoes in a dream means almost recovery, God willing. If the dreamer buys mangoes and is happy and the mangoes are fresh and good, this means that he will be able to solve all his problems very soon. All he has to do is use logic in thinking and not follow his whims. Seeing a poor and needy mango in a dream means that there will be food and money soon, God willing, and that there are many opportunities that he will face and he must take advantage of them. Fruit in a dream means a quiet and comfortable life, with little Of problems, God willing. Mangoes can almost show good news and comfort, after many difficult crises and problems. Abundant and fresh fruit means a lot of money, and a lot of good and positive changes. Rotten fruits, especially mangoes, may indicate that the dreamer needs to review his accounts. With God, because you

With God, because you

title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee: The meaning of preparing coffee in a dream

preview.html: See I drink coffee for single people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for men, I make coffee, I serve sweet or bitter coffee, for gentlemen, see a cup of coffee, spill, pour a cup of coffee by Ibn Sirin and others. Drinking coffee in a dream is considered one of the dreams that spread in our lives and is seen Men and women constantly and very greatly, due to the large amount of coffee that we drink daily in our lives, it has become one of the essential things for the most beautiful completion of the day, as seeing coffee in a dream has many great meanings and associations. For you. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained to us in his interpretations a number of important sayings and interpretations of seeing drinking coffee in a dream. We will review them for you. Interpretation of drinking coffee in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is drinking coffee, this indicates that his companions do not agree with his intention to marry, and this indicates many disputes and disputes. In his family if he is married, and whoever sees that he trades in coffee. In a dream, he will fail in this trade, and he will certainly lose if he sells it, and if he buys it, he will maintain his good reputation among the people. Whoever sees coffee or drinks it in a dream will hear the murmurs of those around her, if she does not be careful in her actions, and seeing dry strength means the care of suspicious strangers. As for seeing green coffee, it means that you have bold enemies who will work to defeat you mercilessly, and anyone who sees a coffee grinder in a dream will approach danger and do everything in his power to avoid dire consequences. Interpretation of drinking coffee in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Drinking coffee in a dream is evidence of You treat people with wisdom and care. Drinking coffee in a dream and having a bitter taste in the mouth for a man is evidence of family opposition in matters of marriage and engagement. Seeing coffee for a married man in a dream is evidence of marital discord. Making coffee in a dream is evidence of kindness and abundant livelihood. Seeing a single man Making coffee in a dream is evidence that the girl is engaged in good morals. A married man making coffee in a dream is evidence that abundant money will come to the person. Drinking coffee in a dream and the cup breaking is evidence that the person is committing immoral acts. Seeing someone boiling coffee in a dream is evidence that There are those who are planning evil against him. Seeing bitter coffee in a dream is clear evidence of bad news. A person who grinds coffee in a dream is evidence of upcoming happiness for him. Drinking coffee, grinding it, or pouring it for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of the beginning of her pregnancy with a boy. A pregnant woman indicates The one who pours coffee in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a girl. Seeing a pregnant woman drinking coffee in the last stages of pregnancy is evidence of easy childbirth and the safety of the child. If a pregnant woman sees a broken coffee cup, this indicates that she will suffer during pregnancy. Seeing a married woman drinking coffee In a dream, it is evidence of the good that will come to her and the improvement of her life. Seeing a married woman serving coffee to her guests and her husband is evidence that good news has reached her. Boiling coffee for a married woman in a dream is evidence that her husband

title: More than 30 interpretations of seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
The horse in a dream and the interpretation of its meaning by leading scholars. The horse in the Arabic language is the name given by the ancient Arabs to a horse or steed, and the horse is an animal characterized by strength and boldness or the dreamer’s position on it. Seeing a horse in a dream In fact, the horse is a symbol of boldness and ferocity, so it indicates the strength of the character that distinguishes it. The dreamer, and the people around him, respect and appreciate him. The interpretation of a dream about a horse, according to many interpreters, is considered a good vision that indicates blessing and abundance on the way to the dreamer, and in most cases it refers to the human spirit. If one sees that he is petting a horse in a dream, this indicates the end A quarrel between him and a family member, and perhaps it indicates the return of old love. As for seeing a horse running quickly, and the dreamer trying to catch up with him, this indicates a bad quality that the dreamer carries, or that he is in a hurry to make decisions, or that he made a fatally wrong decision in the future. previous period. It will cause him a lot of problems...and he must rethink the matter and reflect on his decisions in the past period. Also, seeing buying a horse in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to marry a woman he loves. If a man sees that he is riding a horse and crossing the sea with him, then he transports him Safely to the opposite land, this indicates that the person will overcome all his problems and solve them safely - God willing - soon. Seeing a person standing among many horses preparing to run a race, this vision indicates that he is working exhausted and exhausted until he succeeds in his field of work, despite the intense competition. Between him and his friends at work. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream? Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing a knight’s uniform and preparing to ride a horse, indicates that he will achieve an important goal in his life in the coming period. If one sees himself talking to A horse in a dream, this means that he needs to be alone for a while, and to review some important steps in his life and consider himself responsible. But if he sees that he is kidnapping a horse that is not his, and taking it from its owner by force, this means that his profit is forbidden, or that he will succeed in His work is at the expense of injustice. Some people. A horse in a dream, running around the dreamer, indicates the great success that the dreamer will achieve and that the world will witness. As for the one who sees himself in the dream busy raising and caring for a horse, this indicates that he is a person who loves doing good and helping people, or that he benefits many people with his knowledge. Al-Wafir. Also, seeing a person carrying a horse, but suddenly running away from it and running, indicates that he wants to escape from his problems or wants to get rid of the various psychological restrictions that he feels are paralyzing his movement towards achieving his goals.
ZOE.If one sees himself falling from the back of a horse, this means that he will face a setback in his life in the coming period, and perhaps he will lose his job or lose a large amount of money. A dream about a horse in a dream about a married woman. A married woman who sees a horse in a dream, sees emaciated And a weak appearance, indicates that her husband is seriously ill and one of her parents may become ill. But if

title: Interpretation of a dream about a cat biting me on the left hand of a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cat biting my left arm in a dream for a single girl: An unmarried girl, when she dreams of seeing a cat growing in her house, takes some of it in her left hand in the dream. The vision indicates that her closest friends will betray her, which makes the dreamer feel very sad, and God knows best. As for the unmarried girl who saw her cat attacking her ferociously and it began to bite her left hand in the dream. This dream indicates that in the dreamer’s life there is a person who has recovered well and was met with denial and lack of origin, and God knows best. Seeing a cat in the dream of an unmarried girl whom she does not know, and some of them were standing, and she felt pain. The result of this bite in the dream is severe. The vision means that the unmarried girl is engaged to someone who does not suit her, and the engagement is broken off and she faces many compensations, and God knows best. Seeing the bite of a black cat in a dream, a single girl in a dream. It is a metaphor for the evil and humiliation that the dreamer suffers from in her life, and God knows best. An unmarried girl who dreams that she was able to escape from a cat bite and get rid of it in a dream. This dream is good because it shows the dreamer’s ability to solve his problems and get rid of his enemies, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a cat being born in the house. Interpretation of seeing a cat bite my left hand in The dream of a married woman. The married woman who sees her cat growing up in her house, with some of it on her left hand in the dream, and she is in pain because of that. This is evidence that the dreamer is being denied love and charity by the people who wish them well and guide them to goodness, and God knows best. A married woman saw that a cat bit her in the The dream, and she was sad and in pain because of the bite. The dream symbolizes the dreamer’s sadness due to the many problems in her married life, and God knows best. A married woman sees herself getting rid of a cat bite and running away from it in a dream. It means that the dreamer will be able to solve her problems soon, and God knows best. In the case of the married woman who saw A cat bites her husband severely and she felt sorry for him in a dream. It is a big sign that her husband will suffer a major loss at work, which will affect his married life, and God knows best. Seeing a cat biting her left hand in a dream for a married woman indicates that there are major problems with the husband’s family, and God knows best. Interpretation Seeing a cat biting me on my left hand in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man dreams of seeing a cat biting his hand in a dream and he is hurt and sad for it. An unpleasant vision because it indicates that the fortuneteller will leave his job or face a big problem at work, and God knows best. And the man who sees the cat will grow up and treat it well in the future. A dream while you are trying to bite him, and this hurts him a lot. It is an indication that there is a person close to God who is doing good for him and who hates him and is planning to betray him, and God knows best. The man sees himself controlling a cat attacking him in a dream, a sign of his ability to restrain his wife. It also means that he is able to Resolving crises and overcoming difficulties in his field of work, and God knows best. When a man saw in a dream a cat biting a girl on the left hand, he was in pain because of that. It is a metaphor for a big problem with his wife and he must solve it, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about a cat that is chasing me for a single woman. Meaning of seeing

title: Interpretation of the ear in a dream: Seeing the ear in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the ear for an unmarried girl, pregnant women, divorced women, and married or unmarried men. Clean the right or left ear with wax, cut the earlobe, and stab the ear with pain from the blood. It emerges from the water according to Ibn Sirin and not only. Interpretation of the dream of ears in a dream. The ear in a dream indicates hearing. Whoever sees that his ear has grown or improved, this indicates his guidance and acceptance of the command of his Lord. The ear is the place of awareness, so in a dream it indicates a child, money and status. Perhaps the ear indicates knowledge, reason, religion, kingship, family, and race with which a person is beautified, and the ear indicates hearing, so whoever sees that his hearing is enlarged or improved, or a light outside or entering it, then this indicates his guidance and obedience to God Almighty and his acceptance of His command. And if the ear in the dream is small, or An unpleasant odor emanated from it, as this indicates deception of the truth and stopping when there is a need for hatred from God Almighty. The large number of ears indicates the arts of science or that it has not been proven in one case. Perhaps the ear indicates what is connected to the jewel, so if his ear becomes the ear of an animal, its place will be taken from it, and its place will be reduced. His sanctity, and dulls his mind. And whoever dreams of putting two fingers in his ears, this indicates his death as an innovator. If the fortuneteller is in heresy and misguidance, then he sees that he is putting his fingers in his ears, then this indicates his death and his determination to abandon what he did, or that he is a muezzin and the king’s ear is his spy. It was said that the ear It is a man’s wife, daughter, or someone else. Whoever sees an accident or increase in his ears in a dream, then this is interpreted as the man’s wife, daughter, sister, or similar women. Whoever dreams of his ear being torn from him is the death or separation of one of them. And whoever sees that it is true, this indicates his understanding and knowledge. And the validity of his certainty and intent. If he dreams that he is deaf, then this is corruption in his religion. Whoever sees many ears, this indicates that he listens to speech and does not pay attention to it and does not understand it. Whoever sees that something was missing, this has been accomplished. And whoever sees that his hearing is intact, this is evidence of... His understanding, knowledge, health, religion, and certainty. Whoever sees that he is deaf in a dream means corruption in his religion. Whoever sees that he has half an ear, his wife will die. Whoever sees that he eats from the dirt from his ears and then has sex with the boy. Whoever dreams that he has an ear will die soon. If he dreams that he has A ring hanging in his ears in a dream means that he will marry his daughter and give him a son, and it is said: The ear is a religion. And whoever sees: many calls to prayer, then turns away from the truth and does not accept them, it is said that if he sees that he has beautiful and symmetrical ears, then he will hear good news, and if they are not Beautiful, then he hears bad news. And whoever sees: as if he has two eyes in his ears, then he is blind. It has been said: Whoever sees that he has many ears, then he will praise him for those who want to have someone who obeys him, from women, children, and kings. As for the rich, he indicates good news to them if the call is beautiful, otherwise It is news of a cursed person. As for the Mamluks and defendants in disputes, it indicates the continuation of his enslavement, is permitted, and is obedient, and shows the plaintiff that the decision is binding on him. Cutting off an ear in a dream is evidence of corruption. Perhaps an extra ear indicates a person's permission to do what he wants. If it is a good ear, then what he wants is good. Interpretation of using earringsWhoever dreams of earrings

title: Interpretation of seeing a mustache shaving in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing yourself shaving your mustache in a dream, according to what the great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin explained in his book Interpretation of Dreams. The mustache is the thick hair that grows above the lips, and it is one of the things that a man is proud of. His mustache, and he wants to know the meaning of this vision. A woman may see in her dream that he has a mustache and shave it, which would frighten her if she saw that. The dream is for single girls, married and pregnant women, follow us. Interpretation of seeing shaving a mustache in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is cutting his mustache, this is a sign of the money he will get soon. Seeing himself shaving his mustache in a dream may mean that There are many bad friends in the dreamer’s life and he must be careful of them. Seeing one shaving his mustache in a dream indicates the dreamer’s bad reputation and that there are those who speak ill of him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is cutting his mustache, this is a sign that he will give up responsible things. About him in the coming period. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is shaving his mustache and in reality he does not have a mustache, this is a sign that he is a mysterious and unclear person. And if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is shaving his mustache and is bothered by this step, then this is a good vision and has many bad connotations and indicates that The dreamer will lose money or his health will deteriorate, and the vision may indicate the emergence of problems and worries in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a mustache for one girl: Interpretation scholars say that seeing a mustache in an unmarried girl’s dream portends her engagement or marriage in the coming period. If an unmarried girl sees that she is cutting off her mustache and shaving it This is a good vision that indicates getting rid of the problems and sorrows that bother her in her life. Seeing a single girl shaving her mustache in her dream means that she will achieve all the desires and ambitions that she wants to achieve. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a man with a large mustache, this vision indicates marriage to A man with a strong personality. If the unmarried girl is already engaged and sees in her dream that she has a short mustache, then this vision shows the love and tenderness between her and her fiancé and that she is always striving to improve their relationship. Interpretation of a dream about a mustache for a married woman: Seeing a married woman shaving his mustache in her dream indicates The death of the worries and troubles that she suffers from in her life and the arrival of kindness and contentment to her. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is cutting off her mustache and is upset by this vision, this is a sign that there is someone following her and always reminding her of the bad things among people, so she should do so. Be careful of the people around her. Interpretation of shaving a mustache in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation scholars say that seeing shaving a mustache in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will get rid of the pain she is suffering from, and that her pregnancy period will pass peacefully. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is cutting her mustache without To shave it completely, this is an unpleasant vision, and an indication of the presence of someone who wants to harm her. Interpretation of a dream about shaving the mustache and beard for a man: If the sleeper sees in his dream that

title: Interpretation of thirst in a dream Meaning of thirst in a dream

preview.html: A dream of thirst for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a severe shortage of water, drinking water, and lack of hydration for a thirsty dead person, according to Ibn Sirin and others. The presence of these symbols in dreams may have certain connotations, and among the most famous sayings in this area: Hunger is better than satiety, and quenching is better than thirst. Interpretation of thirst in a dream Thirst in interpretation is a strong need for money and symbolizes emotional deprivation Thirst in a man's sleep is exhausted in matters of livelihood In women's dreams, it symbolizes emotional problems Thirst is preferred in visions if it is followed by quenching, and the best thing that quenches thirst in a dream is milk or water. It is not good in a dream to quench your thirst by drinking coffee or drinking wine The presence of the thirst symbol in dreams is often the result of deprivation or things that are not easy or cannot be achieved in reality, whether emotional, spiritual, or even social. If you can quench your thirst in a dream and drink a tiger, this means that you will achieve your goals and get out of this difficult stage you are going through. As for Whoever sees that he is thirsty and cannot quench his thirst, the tiger indicates that he will not be able to get what he wants. Drinking water regularly can indicate good health, success and distinction. On the other hand, seeing yourself drinking water greedily and without stopping leads to the deprivation you suffer from. Seeing thirst and drinking cold water is lawful money as narrated by Ibn Sirin. As for drinking hot water in a dream, it is a disease. As for hot or non-hot water, it is worries and concerns. Thirst caused by fever can indicate a health condition. As for drinking wine to quench your thirst in a dream, it may indicate some nervous disorders or it may indicate that you are in a dangerous, forced and dissatisfied situation. If you are thirsty in a dream, this means that you aspire to achieve things beyond your current capabilities. But if it is possible to quench your thirst at prices, you will be able to fulfill your desires. If you see others thirsty and drink to quench their thirst, this means that you will get many benefits through the rich. Interpretation of thirst in a single dream An unmarried girl may feel thirsty in her dreams, and in her dream she may lack that water or any drink that removes the feeling of thirst. In fact, this dream indicates a serious emotional void and may indicate estrangement from friends or loved ones. As for the girl who sees in her dream that she is drinking or quenching her thirst, this clearly indicates the disappearance of problems and worries, especially if what she drinks in the dream is water, juice or something like that. Thirst in a single woman's dream can indicate thirst for something or a certain feeling or a certain situation. The girl may feel very thirsty because she is waiting for the result of the examination and may feel a dry throat because of her fear of this result. Thirst in this context can benefit the fortuneteller waiting or impatience of a certain person. Thirst in a married woman's dream A married woman feels in her dream that she is thirsty when she suffers from her husband's alienation or lack of interest in her. A married woman may also feel thirsty in her dream when she is in

title: What is the interpretation of a dream when seeing someone you love according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream to see someone you love, and seeing someone you love in reality is a beautiful thing and has many good meanings that the person certainly has. Follow usWhat is the interpretation of seeing someone you love in a dream? The presence of someone you love in a dream shows many good signs that will be beneficial to him. In the event that the dreamer sees in a dream that there is harm to someone he loves, it interprets that the dreamer is very afraid of this person and is worried about him. The interpretation of a dream where you see someone you love shows that the relationship between you is very good and there is an exchange of love between you in reality. When you dream that someone you love is laughing, but this indicates that your relationship is very good and that there are happy things happening for you together. If you see someone you love ignoring you in a dream, This indicates that there is a dispute between you and you must take the initiative to make peace until things improve. Interpretation of dreams of seeing someone you love by Ibn SirinSeeing someone you love in a dream according to the interpretations of Imam Ibn Sirin indicates the strength of the bond that unites you and that you already have great love for him. When a dreamer sees someone he loves in a dream while he is far away from him, this means that the dreamer desperately wants to meet this person and wants to return to him in any way. The presence of a loved one at a distance from you in a dream symbolizes the missed opportunities that the dreamer has experienced in his life and that he did not He takes advantage of the circumstances well. When the dreamer sees someone he loves smiling at him in a dream, it is fortunate that the dreamer will achieve what he wants and realize all his dreams. Sadness when seeing someone he loves in a dream indicates that the dreamer is tired of his relationship with this person and the differences between them have increased in the past period. Interpretation of a dream in which you see someone you love single. Seeing someone you love in one dream means that good things will happen to her in life. When a girl sees the person she was previously linked to during the dream, this symbolizes that she still loves him and does not want this relationship to end. When she sees A Seki girl in a dream, then this is a sign of his desire to return to her and improve their relationship again. In the event that a girl sees in a dream a person she loves and is ignoring her, this means that this person is deceiving her and she must stay away from him as soon as possible. If an unmarried woman in a dream is able to talk To the one she loves, this is a good sign that the dreamer will fulfill many desires in her life. Not speaking to the one she loves in one dream means that there are some bad things that will happen in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of seeing someone she loves on the one hand in a single woman Seeing someone Someone who loves him from one side in a dream shows her sadness over her inability to reveal the secrets of her heart to him. Also, when this vision of a girl is repeated in a dream, it is a sign of the person’s intense longing and desire to see him in reality. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love in my home for single people: Seeing someone you love in My house for singles indicates that this person really loves the dreamer and there is a good chance that he will propose to her soon. One scholar narrated that seeing someone she loves inside her house in a dream indicates that God is providing her with goodness and benefit. When she sees a woman
